column3: str
The time has come for Lord Hien to return to Doma.
Speak with Gosetsu.
Speak with Hien.
Speak with Alphinaud.
Let's go. Everyone is waiting for us back at the House of the Fierce!
Heh heh...I wonder what Yugiri will have to say when we tell her of our adventures?
Right, then. To the House of the Fierce. With me, my friends!
Err, remind me─what part of Yanxia is this again?
Ahh...this air that fills my breast, these sounds which resound in my ears. I am home.
I have not used this road before, but... Ah. I recognize this place.
The House of the Fierce should lie somewhere to the south. I will go on ahead and inform the sentries of our master's return.
Huh, I didn't realize there was another entrance.
Here we are! I wonder if they all are gathered inside, waiting...perhaps expecting a speech or some such...
Well! No matter! I shall have to do what I shall have to do!
So...have we got a plan? Tell me someone's got a plan.
Alphinaud has been hard at work devising our strategy to seize Doma Castle. I'm sure he will be happy to share the details with you all shortly.
No time to soak it in. We have work to do.
Not that I doubted you for a moment, but I am relieved to see him returned.
All is in place. We need but commit to action and see it through to the end.
Lord Hien has returned! Lord Hien has returned! And together we will drive the imperials out of Doma once and for all!
I knew Lord Hien only by name and reputation until today. There is no denying that he has a presence...
Once more, welcome back. It is good to see you again, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>.
Ah, yes. There is another recent development we neglected to share with you.
Alisaie and I have been hard at work attempting to restore the aetheryte here to its former glory...and I am pleased to inform you that we succeeded!
Suffice it to say, it should prove a boon for travel─well, for those replete with anima like you, at least...
